views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 and 11

iOS 9 styled folders for iOS 10+

Configure options from Settings.

- Fixed grayish looking dark mode blur when folders are opened - Added official iOS 11 support! - Dark mode now tints the close folder icon! - Code base changes settings should apply immediately! - More updates soon. -Preference Panel Added
-Dark Folder background option added


-Fixed the issue where icons would still show when folder was open thanks to @candoizo for the help and @cpdigitaldarkroom for the constructive criticism

-Should now be more iOS 9 like

-More features soon
